rev.desc.rev.desc: No need to update the scaccesss table since the RTE will read the scFolderAccess directly.
The purpose to keep this trigger RAD is to convert some speical table name (cm3, ocm) to actual table name record.

descript.descript: No need to update the scaccesss table since the RTE will read the scFolderAccess directly.
The purpose to keep this trigger RAD is to convert some speical table name (cm3, ocm) to actual table name record.
